column4: this the general question channel for ubuntu? I've got some feature/debian vs ubuntu difference questions
is there an ubuntu noob channel somewhere?
I'm running debian atm I got a few questions about ubuntus enhancements vs standard gnome/kde canned install. What enhancements are added to the environs (mimetypes, fileassociations etc?)
generally, an attempt is made at chosing a bestofbreed program, rather than several programs
ubuntu also follows gnome very closely
in fact, we have totem in since warty
ah uhm does it give you the ability to tweak the best of breeds to another app and still maintain mimeish type stuffs and the like
you can install other apps yes
ubuntu has very little in custom stuff. There is a big pressure, and a good one, to push everything good that we do upstream
Mark Shuttleworth, in a lug radio interview, called in the distro upstreams will love
in addition, most of debian in is universe if it is not already in main
what does it switch with a mouse scroll?
if you scroll on the workspace switcher (which is part of the panel), then switch workspaces
hrm i'll have to throw ubuntu on a spare box and check it out, last time I used metacity wheel switching wasn't working as I'd hoped or at all, perhaps thats changed
the workspace thing is not metacity.
likely it was X not configuring your mouse with scrolling
no it was metacity
mouse wheel switching works fine and has for some time in other wms but like I said maybe newer code has a feature that it may not have in the past
you mentioned it'll wheel on the switcher applet does it work on the bg or unfocused environ too?
i'm not sure of its current capabilities
